metadata.title: CVE-2015-8396 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the ImageRegionReader::ReadIntoBuffer function inMediaStorageAndFileFormat/gdcmImageRegionReader.cxx in Grassroots DICOM(aka GDCM) before 2.6.2 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code viacrafted header dimensions in a DICOM image file, which triggers a bufferoverflow.

criterions.comment: gdcm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
